conclusion: Analyze the flow direction of the liquid as it passes through the baffles.
The baffles are placed in such a way that they create a path for the liquid to follow.
The liquid will flow from the top of the image towards the bottom, following the path created by the baffles.
Liquid will flow down from Baffle A and then turn left, entering Container E.
Liquid will flow down from Baffle B and then turn right, entering Container F.
Liquid will flow down from Baffle C and then turn left, entering Container E.
Liquid will flow down from Baffle D and then turn right, entering Container F.
Liquid from A and C will flow into Container E, and liquid from B and D will flow into Container F.
Final answer: Liquid from A and C will flow into Container E, and liquid from B and D will flow into Container F.
